messageText:
1. 0x2BB853bc43Ea871d4Cb1D8D8EB53a5B93907404F
2. 8JZ2sWqVjer1gb3nNyB7tKS7aNnx8JByw4rV8Ka667kB
3. My CASH-USDC LP token is 57piviuRp77w8oJHzW7dhwQZ3YWH3LtKmdhnFRB25rEH, I was using tulip.garden as an auto-compounder so the LP amount was growing over time. I withdrew everything few hours after the hack and didn't touch the LP in my wallet since.
4. /
5. LP amount: 243110.3 CASH-USDC
6. I borrowed a lot of money from banks and family and put them in DeFi since the returns were so much better. Now my family is in a deep financial crisis. I haven't been able to sleep for days. I feel devastated and my mind has been in very dark places since the hack. I can provide any documents needed to prove my financial situation: bank statements, loan agreements, etc. If I get my money back I will donate all the profits to charity. I can't see a way out from this situation without your help. I'M IN YOUR HANDS.
